---
title: "Chapter 10: Other Considerations"
---

> *Chapter goals:*
>
> 1.  *Gain insight into different career paths in psychiatric genetics*
>
> 2.  *Understand the limitations of genetic prediction*
>
> 3.  *Understand how small effect sizes in genetic studies are still beneficial for understanding disease etiology.*
>
> 4.  *Understand what biological essentialism is, how it impacts medicine and science, exacerbates health disparities and perpetuates discrimination.*
>
> 5.  *Understand the importance of diversity in genetic studies, how to include and protect vulnerable populations in genetic studies, and how to conduct equitable collaborative research with low- or middle-income countries (LMIC).*
>
> 6.  *Gain insight into the structure and rules of the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), why it is important, and how to navigate the guidelines for scientific research.*
